Intentionally, I might decide to give them more than I do because I want to mirror their potential or offer something even better in return. Since it's a zero-sum game, any gain for one is a loss for the other. So, if I give them $5, they'd get $15 back—maybe that's the way to create some parity.

Alternatively, maybe not mirroring at all because of different personalities and goals. But since both are primarily designing, perhaps giving more aligns with that shared interest.
